articles.title: How the Nintendo Switch 2 delay explains Trump’s tariffs - Vox
articles.description: The preorder delay and potential price increase for Nintendo’s latest gaming console is an example of the economic chaos Trump is wreaking.

articles.title: Microsoft turns 50 today, and it made me think about MS-DOS 5.0 - Ars Technica
articles.description: A story about an obsolete PC, an old library book, and a one version of MS-DOS.

articles.title: Microsoft employee disrupts 50th anniversary and calls AI boss ‘war profiteer’ - The Verge
articles.description: A Microsoft employee disrupted the company’s 50th anniversary event to protest its use of AI.

articles.title: The Duskbloods trades FromSoft’s sweet maidens for an ‘elderly gentleman’ rat - Polygon
articles.description: FromSoftware’s tradition of maidens like Elden Ring’s Ranni and Melina won’t carry over to The Duskbloods, which is more Nintendo-esque.

articles.title: iOS 18.4: Access Hidden Ambient Music Playlists - MacRumors
articles.description: In Apple's iOS 18.4 software update, there's a new Ambient Music feature available in the Control Center options on iPhone. It's free to...
